org.apache.catalina.deploy
Class ContextEjb

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.catalina.deploy.ContextEjb
public final class ContextEjb
extends java.lang.Object

Representation of an EJB resource reference for a web application, as represented in a <ejb-ref> element in the deployment descriptor.

Version:
$Revision: 466595 $ $Date: 2006-10-21 18:24:41 -0400 (Sat, 21 Oct 2006) $
Author:
Craig R. McClanahan
